Posts.Content: I havr had a purple mark about 1cm away from nipple. It appeared about 6 months ago and hasnt really changed. Not sure how to put a pic on? 0 likes, 2 replies Report
Posts.Title: Purple mark next to nipple ???

Posts.Content: Sorry you're going through this.  Even if you post a picture, no one on this site can give you a medical diagnosis--we're not doctors.  Please go heck with your doctor.  Most anything can be helped if caught in time.  Best of luck to you. xx Report
